com.owteam.engUtils.cert

Class CertTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.owteam.engUtils.cert.CertTool

  • public class CertTool
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for getting certificates without validating them and for performing a fingerprint

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CertTool() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String fingerprint(java.security.cert.Certificate cert)
      This returns the sha1 digest of a certificate in the same format as openssl x509 -fingerprint option
      static java.security.cert.Certificate[] getCerts(java.net.URL url)
      This method returns the certs for a site even when the cert doesn't validate.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CertTool

        public CertTool()

    • Method Detail

      • getCerts

        public static java.security.cert.Certificate[] getCerts(java.net.URL url)
                                                 throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                        java.security.KeyManagementException,
                                                        java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                                        java.io.IOException,
                                                        java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException
        This method returns the certs for a site even when the cert doesn't validate. Do not use this if possible as it will momentartily set the jvm to use a non validating trustmanager.
        Parameters:
        url - The url to get certificates from.
        Returns:
        An array of Certificates returned from the url.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.KeyManagementException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.io.IOException
        java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException

      • fingerprint

        public static java.lang.String fingerprint(java.security.cert.Certificate cert)
                                    throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                           java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException
        This returns the sha1 digest of a certificate in the same format as openssl x509 -fingerprint option
        Parameters:
        cert - The certificate to get the fingerprint of
        Returns:
        The fingerprint
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.cert.CertificateEncodingException
